name: Mariusz Jan Skobel

Proven problem-solving skills paired with strong written and verbal communication abilities. Proficient in modern technology stacks such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside extensive experience in full-stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Skilled in developing and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**. Brings practical experience in MLOps—from developing ML pipelines to managing production workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about delivering high-performance software solutions that drive real-world impact in sectors such as healthcare and finance.
